snippet: Japan's health ministry filed a criminal complaint against Novartis AG's local unit on Thursday after the pharmaceuticals company promoted its best-selling blood pressure drug Diovan using manipulated data....

headline.print_headline: Japan Ministry Files Criminal Complaint Against Novartis Over Diovan
headline.main: Japan Ministry Files Criminal Complaint Against Novartis Over Diovan

lead_paragraph: Japan's health ministry filed a criminal complaint against Novartis AG's local unit on Thursday after the pharmaceuticals company promoted its best-selling blood pressure drug Diovan using manipulated data.
